author: bionicle101
title: A nice Bohrok Va.
review:
I got this from my uncle a few years ago.

PROS:

Good pieces

Cheap

Easy to build

Fun to collect krana


CONS:

What are you insinuating!


Buy it while it's still on ebay!


I am bionicle101 and I approve of this review.

author: legofan3810
title: Kinda Small...........
review:
Well this is a pretty puny Bionicle. My dad dug this set up from one of his old boxes and he said i could have it. I was pretty surprised that bionicle sets could be so small, but i noticed that this was made in it's beginning years. Anyway, this is a fairly OK set. To the Pros and Cons.

Pros
Cool Bionicle
Nice addition to anybodies Bionicle Collection.

Cons
The Mask always falls off the back.

Overall, a 4 out of 5.

author: BuilderBrothers
title: The Water Bohrok Va
review: The Bohrok Va didn't really impress me (due to their small size) which is why my rating are low.  The Bohrok Va Gahlok was the water Bohrok Va who was teamed up with the Bohrok Va.  The claw piece and krana add a little to the set, and if you want to add a small, cheap water element bionicle to your collection, then this is a set you will probably want.
